lyrics.text: Lesson 70. Read the danger. First listen and then answer the question. How was the drunk
lyrics.translation: 第70课。阅读危险。首先听录音，然后回答问题。那个醉汉怎么样了？

lyrics.text: removed from the ring? During a bullfight, a drunk suddenly wandered into the middle
lyrics.translation: 从戒指中移除？在一场斗牛比赛中，一个醉汉突然走进了中间

lyrics.text: of the ring. The crowd began to shout, but the drunk was unaware of the danger. The bull
lyrics.translation: 戒指。人群开始喊叫，但醉汉没有意识到危险。公牛

lyrics.text: was busy with the matador at the time, but it suddenly caught sight of the drunk, who
lyrics.translation: 当时正忙着和斗牛士周旋，但突然它看到了那个醉汉，

lyrics.text: was shouting rude remarks and waving a red cap. Apparently sensitive to criticism, the
lyrics.translation: 他正在喊叫粗鲁的评论，并且挥舞着一顶红色的帽子。显然对批评很敏感，这位

lyrics.text: bull forgot all about the matador and charged at the drunk. The crowd suddenly grew quiet.
lyrics.translation: 公牛忘记了斗牛士，向醉汉冲去。人群突然变得安静。

lyrics.text: The drunk, however, seemed quite sure of himself. When the bull got close to him,
lyrics.translation: 然而，那个醉汉似乎对自己非常有信心。当公牛靠近他时，

lyrics.text: he clumsily stepped aside to let it pass. The crowd broke into cheers and the drunk bowed.
lyrics.translation: 他笨拙地让开路让它过去。人群爆发出欢呼声，醉酒的人鞠躬致意。

lyrics.text: By this time, however, three men had come into the ring, and they quickly dragged the
lyrics.translation: 到这个时候，然而，已经有三个人进入了拳击台，他们迅速地拖走了

lyrics.text: drunk to safety. Even the bull seemed to feel sorry for him, for it looked on sympathetically
lyrics.translation: 安全地醉了。连公牛似乎都为他感到难过，因为它同情地看着他。

lyrics.text: until the drunk was out of the way, before once more turning its attention to the matador.
lyrics.translation: 直到那个醉汉离开了，它才再次将注意力转向斗牛士。
